subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|やかた}}

Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=やかた|屋|tr1=ya|t1=house, hut, structure|形|tr2=kata|t2=shape, form}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|やかた}}

# a [[roofed]] [[structure]] on a [[boat]], shaped like a [[house]]
# a [[house]]-shaped structure on a [[cart]], such as a [[caravan]]
# a [[temporary]] [[house]], a temporary [[shelter]]
# a [[mansion]], a [[manor]] [[house]], an [[estate]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=やかた|honorific|archaic}} a form of address or reference for a [[noble]]
# {{clipping of|lang=ja|sort=やかた|屋形船|nodot=1}} (''yakata-bune''): a [[houseboat]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|たて}}

# a large [[building]]
# a [[mansion]], a [[villa]], an [[estate]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=たて|honorific|archaic}} a form of address or reference for a [[noble]]
# a small [[castle]] or [[fort]]

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|たち}}

# a large [[building]]
# a [[mansion]], a [[villa]], an [[estate]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=たち|honorific|archaic}} a form of address or reference for a [[noble]]
# a small [[castle]] or [[fort]]

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かん|hhira=くわん}}

# a large [[building]]
# a [[mansion]], a [[villa]], an [[estate]]
# a [[movie]] [[theatre]]

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|かん|hhira=くわん}}

# a [[hall]], a [[building]], a section of a building, a [[house]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|むろつみ}}

Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=むろつみ|室|tr1=muro|t1=cellar; room|積み|tr2=tsumi|t2=piling up, heaping up, stacking up|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|積む}} ''tsumu'', “to pile, heap, or stack up”}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> possibly in reference to the way that the oldest such buildings may have started out as simple [[pithouse]]s.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|むろつみ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=むろつみ|rare|archaic}} [[lodging]]s along a [[stagecoach]] [[route]], an [[inn]]
